review.title: “NOT FOR ME”
review.pros: Pros – It provided a steady check. Work was interesting and challenging at times. First couple of months had plenty of overtime.
review.cons: Cons – This place was a spin off of a company that was bought out and eventually closed.They used a "good old boy" network to run the shop.Had to promise extreme amounts of hours for compensatiion.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Examine the way the shop was run. Lost many good employees because of middle management issues. DRUG TESTING would be an improvement.
